Looking for a nearby hotel in new york city? 


The New Yorker, a Wyndham Hotel, is located in Midtown West, just minutes from Penn Station and Times Square.  Make use of our handy-map below to help guide your way to our property located at 481 8th Avenue & 34th Street, New York, NY 10001 . 

Our historic Art-Deco hotel will enable you to put your feet up after a busy day taking in the sights of New York City, a stressful day attending meetings, or whatever else you've been up to in the Big Apple. 
At the New Yorker Hotel you can enjoy luxurious yet affordable acommodations right in the heart of the city, with upscale rooms and suites. The Tick Tock Diner is serving food 24 hours a day, perfect for those arriving at unsocial hours. You can even take in stunning views of NY from our Sky Lounge, which is the perfect venue for business events near the Jacob Javits Center.
